title: Highlights Edinburgh 1986 Commonwealth Games
brief_description: Ten days of vivid emotion, colour and competition are captured on this specially compiled video containing highlights of the X111th Commonwealth Games held in Edinburgh, Scotland. All ten sports are featured and there are many memorable moments as athletes achieve long hoped for success or experience the pain of defeat.
